ComicInfo.Summary:
IT'S THE COLOMBIAN SHOWDOWN.
In the bloody climax to her Colombian adventure, Hit-Girl makes her last stand against Palmira's gang lords. She's enslaved Mano as a sidekick, but will he finally crack and turn weapons on his own people? HIT-GIRL #4 is an action-packed gorefestâ€”the bloodbath before Mindy sets off to her next destination.
